rules_text:
Whenever Mimic of the Basilisk deals combat damage to a player, excavate. [i](Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a land card, put a colorless artifact token named Loot onto the battlefield. It has ‘Sacrifice this artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool.')[/i]
{1}{U}, Exile a land card from your graveyard: Mimic of the Basilisk gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked until end of turn.
